text: Niscaya tomadera raba allah yini asamanasamuha o yamina chaya [1] dine [2] srsti karechena [3]; tarapara tini â€˜arasera upara uthechena [4]. Tini'i dinake rata diye dheke dena, tadera eke an'yake drutagatite anusarana kare. Ara surya,camda o naksatraraji, ya tamra'i hukumera anugata, ta tini'i srsti karechena [5].Jene rakha, srjana o adesa tamra'i [6]. Srstikulera raba allahâ€Œ kata barakatamaya
